testimonials.review: JTI's Web Development course was a game-changer. The hands-on projects and expert guidance gave me the confidence to pursue my passion and become a professional web developer.
testimonials.author: AKASH AKM (AkmXStar)

testimonials.review: The ADCA program is incredibly thorough. I learned everything from basic computing to advanced applications. The faculty is supportive and always willing to clear doubts.
testimonials.author: Pradip Kumar

testimonials.review: What I loved most about JTI was the focus on practical skills. The ADCA course wasn't just theory; it prepared me for the real-world challenges of the IT industry.
testimonials.author: Rohit Kumar

testimonials.review: The learning environment at JTI is excellent. The teachers are knowledgeable, and the job assistance program really helped me secure a great position right after my course.
testimonials.author: Jeewant Gupta

about_page.title: About JTI Godda
about_page.subtitle: Empowering Jharkhand's youth through quality technical education since 2001.
about_page.mission_desc: To provide accessible, affordable, and high-quality computer education to students in Godda and surrounding areas. We aim to equip them with the practical skills and knowledge needed to succeed in the ever-evolving IT industry.
about_page.history_desc: Established on January 12, 2001, Jharkhand Technical Institute Private Limited was founded with the vision of bridging the digital divide. Over the past two decades, we have successfully trained thousands of students, helping them secure jobs and build fulfilling careers.
about_page.corporate_info_subtitle: We operate with transparency and are a registered private limited company.
about_page.directors_subtitle: Meet the leadership team steering JTI Godda towards excellence.

cca.title: Certificate in Computer Application (CCA)
cca.description: A 3-month intro to computer operations and essential office apps.

dca.title: Diploma in Computer Application (DCA)
dca.description: A 6-month course on computer fundamentals, MS Office, and internet skills.

adca.title: Advanced Diploma in Computer Application (ADCA)
adca.description: A 1-year program covering DCA, Tally, DTP, and an intro to C programming.

tally.title: Tally Prime with GST
tally.description: A 3-month specialized course in Tally Prime for accounting and GST.

dtp.title: Desktop Publishing (DTP)
dtp.description: Learn professional layout design with Photoshop, CorelDRAW, and PageMaker.

typing_en.title: English Typing Course
typing_en.description: Develop fast and accurate English typing skills with structured lessons.

typing_hi.title: Hindi Typing (Mangal/Krutidev)
typing_hi.description: Master Hindi typing on Mangal & Krutidev fonts for professional work.

web.title: Web Development Basics
web.description: An intro to web development covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

python.title: Python Programming
python.description: Learn the versatile Python language, from basic syntax to advanced topics.

java.title: Java Programming
java.description: A deep dive into Java for building robust, enterprise-level applications.

cpp.title: C++ Programming
cpp.description: Master C++ for high-performance applications and systems programming.

cs11.title: Computer Science (Class 11th)
cs11.description: CBSE/JAC curriculum-based coaching for Class 11th Computer Science.

cs12.title: Computer Science (Class 12th)
cs12.description: Advanced coaching for Class 12th Computer Science board exams.

it.title: Information Technology (IT)
it.description: A broad course covering IT fundamentals like hardware, software, and networking.

ites.title: IT Enabled Services (ITES)
ites.description: Learn about IT-enabled services like BPO, KPO, and other business processes.

cca.long_description: A foundational course for beginners to get acquainted with the basics of computer hardware, software, and the MS Office suite.
cca.syllabus: Computer Fundamentals|Operating System (Windows)|MS Paint & WordPad|MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)|Internet & Email

dca.long_description: This diploma provides a comprehensive understanding of computer applications used in offices, covering fundamentals to advanced MS Office skills.
dca.syllabus: All CCA topics|Advanced Excel & PowerPoint|Database concepts with MS Access|Introduction to Financial Accounting|Project Work

adca.long_description: Our flagship one-year program that offers an in-depth study of computer applications, accounting software, design tools, and programming basics.
adca.syllabus: All DCA topics|Tally Prime with GST|DTP (Photoshop, CorelDRAW)|Introduction to C Programming|Personality Development|Final Project

tally.long_description: Become a certified accounting professional with our focused course on Tally Prime, including complete GST compliance.
tally.syllabus: Accounting Basics|Company Creation & Configuration|Ledgers & Vouchers|Inventory Management|GST Setup & Returns|Payroll|Reporting & Analysis

dtp.long_description: Unleash your creativity with our Desktop Publishing course. Learn to design professional graphics, brochures, and layouts.
dtp.syllabus: Design Principles|Adobe Photoshop|CorelDRAW|Adobe PageMaker|Scanning & Printing Techniques|Project Work

typing_en.long_description: Increase your speed and accuracy in English typing through systematic practice and guided lessons.
typing_en.syllabus: Keyboard Layout|Touch Typing Technique|Word Drills & Sentence Practice|Paragraph Typing|Speed & Accuracy Tests

typing_hi.long_description: Master Hindi typing on both Mangal (Remington/Inscript) and Krutidev fonts, essential for many government and private sector jobs.
typing_hi.syllabus: Devanagari Script on Keyboard|Krutidev Font Typing|Mangal Font (Remington & Inscript)|Speed Building Exercises|Complex Passages

web.long_description: Take your first step into web development. This course covers the essential frontend technologies to build static websites.
web.syllabus: Introduction to Web|HTML5|CSS3 (including Flexbox & Grid)|JavaScript (ES6+)|DOM Manipulation|Final Project: A personal portfolio website

python.long_description: Learn Python, one of the world's most popular programming languages, from scratch. Suitable for beginners and those with some programming experience.
python.syllabus: Python Basics (Variables, Data Types)|Control Structures|Functions & Modules|Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)|File Handling|Introduction to Libraries (NumPy, Pandas)

java.long_description: A comprehensive course on Java, focusing on object-oriented principles and building platform-independent applications.
java.syllabus: Core Java Concepts|OOP in Java (Inheritance, Polymorphism)|Exception Handling|Multithreading|Swing/AWT for UI|JDBC for Database Connectivity

cpp.long_description: Master the powerful C++ language, widely used in game development, high-performance computing, and system software.
cpp.syllabus: C++ Fundamentals|Pointers & Memory Management|Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)|Standard Template Library (STL)|File I/O|Data Structures

cs11.long_description: Specialized coaching for Class 11th Computer Science students (CBSE/JAC board), covering the complete syllabus with practicals.
cs11.syllabus: Computer Systems & Organisation|Computational Thinking & Programming - 1 (Python)|Data Management - 1 (SQL)|Society, Law, and Ethics - 1

cs12.long_description: Prepare for your Class 12th board exams with our in-depth Computer Science coaching (CBSE/JAC), focusing on concepts and problem-solving.
cs12.syllabus: Computational Thinking & Programming - 2 (Advanced Python)|Computer Networks|Data Management - 2 (Advanced SQL)|Interface Python with SQL

it.long_description: A broad overview of the Information Technology field, ideal for students who want a general understanding of the IT landscape.
it.syllabus: Computer Hardware & Peripherals|Software & Operating Systems|Computer Networks & Internet|Cyber Security Basics|Emerging Trends in IT

ites.long_description: This course prepares students for careers in the booming IT Enabled Services sector, focusing on communication and process knowledge.
ites.syllabus: Introduction to BPO/KPO|Customer Service Skills|Communication & Soft Skills|Data Entry & Processing|Introduction to CRM software
